text: I had signed up The Ultimate Science PSLE Revision Program in Jan 2024. Over the past 9 months, my daughter and I had a rewarding Science journey with Teacher Kelle. We love the Personalised Q&A Support! She is always timely with her reply and clear in her written explanation. Her Science tips helped us to grasp the concept fast. Her handouts and notes are so easy to understand too. Irregardless of the end result, we would like to say a big THANK YOU for all your help, patience & guidance. Chanced upon Teacher Kelle and Kainetik collaboration and decided to try it out. To our surprise, this is the best science class we had ever attended. Explanations and tips given were elaborated yet clear. The online videos gave us options to replay at our convenient time and our own pace. The Q&A support is amazing as teacher Kelle responds within the day and she is thorough in her explanation. I will definitely recommend students who are struggling with science to try out the online classes.
